rows.label: qst630204_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome, welcome, to limited-time
pop-up hat shop extravaganza!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0002
rows.name:
We stock mushroom hats in all
shapes and sizes! But mostly Nopon
shapes and sizes. Are Nopon favorite!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0003
rows.name:
That be said, do have a few in Invidian
and Superbian cuts. Would be stupid
not to prepare, just in case.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0004
rows.name: Anyhoodle, friends want to take look?

rows.label: qst630204_msg0005
rows.name:
Meh-meh? Friends look for hat
that kick bum-bum?

rows.label: qst630204_msg0006
rows.name:
Scary lady ask same thing recently.
Hatatat was afraid it bum-bum of
Hatatat that receive kicking...

rows.label: qst630204_msg0007
rows.name: Hatatat so scared, he forget to tell lady!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0008
rows.name:
Hatatat is bespoke artisan milliner, also
make hat to order! With name like
Hatatat, have to go for broke, yes?

rows.label: qst630204_msg0009
rows.name:
If scary lady say what kind she want,
Hatatat can draw up design and
calculate material costs.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0010
rows.name:
Then if friends just bring materials,
me can get right to work.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0101
rows.name: So, we go for order-made hat, then?

rows.label: qst630204_msg0102
rows.name: What kind is scary lady want, then?

rows.label: qst630204_msg0103
rows.name: Meh? Meh...? Meh?!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0104
rows.name:
Have to match sparkly-neck off-white
dress of Invidian lady...?

rows.label: qst630204_msg0105
rows.name:
And have to be simple, but also
have to be graceful...?

rows.label: qst630204_msg0106
rows.name:
And on top of that, have high-end
touches and whiff of luxury?!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0107
rows.name:
To ears of Hatatat, sound a bit like
oxymoron on top of oxymoron...

rows.label: qst630204_msg0108
rows.name:
Well, Hatatat never one to shy away
from challenge... Me have a little
thnky-think.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0109
rows.name:
Hatatat have idea.
Maybe crazy enough to work!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0110
rows.name:
Now me tell friends what is need.
Got something to write it down, meh?

rows.label: qst630204_msg0111
rows.name: Sun-Dappled Curtains, three bolts.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0113
rows.name: Crystal Camellias, six should do.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0114
rows.name: And Maple Bite, also six of.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0115
rows.name: Lastly, Rainbow Parfait, four helpings.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0116
rows.name:
Got all that? Friends bring materials,
and Hatatat make hat. Sound fair?

rows.label: qst630204_msg0117
rows.name:
Apologies for hassle! Please to blame
customer, not humble contractor.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0118
rows.name: Oh, but me sure payoff end up worth it!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0201
rows.name:
Hatatat tell friends what he need, yes?
Bring materials and custom hat will
surely follow!
渡す

rows.label: qst630204_msg0301
rows.name:
Meh-meh! Friends do well to gather
so many pricey-precious materials!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0302
rows.name:
Hatatat impress! Maybe integrate
friends into supply chain on more
permanent basis? ...Is joke, is joke.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0303
rows.name:
With materials in place, now is
time of Hatatat to shine! Friends
just wait here.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0304
rows.name: Is finish!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0305
rows.name:
Presenting hat that match sparkly-neck
off-white dress of Invidian lady...

rows.label: qst630204_msg0306
rows.name: And is simple, but also graceful...

rows.label: qst630204_msg0307
rows.name:
And to top off, have high-end
touches and whiff of luxury!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0308
rows.name:
This maybe magnum opus of Hatatat!
Hatatat only hope is no peak too soon...

rows.label: qst630204_msg0309
rows.name:
Hatatat eat through four whole helpings
of Rainbow Parfait while make. Tasty
tasties are great fuel! Delicious too.

rows.label: qst630204_msg0310
rows.name:
Well, no more dilly-dally.
Please to deliver order to customer!

rows.label: qst630204_msg0401
rows.name:
Is maybe magnum opus of Hatatat!
Please to deliver order to customer!
